categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic Special Forces units

nodes.text: Brace Team was a military unit founded by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The group was composed of some of the Alliance's better gunners and heavy weapons specialists. Their missions tended to involve laying down a layer of heavy covering fire between Rebel forces and those of the Galactic Empire. The Tren Opit-Wenbruh served as a member of Brace Team after his previous group, Scandium Team, was disbanded.
